thread.title: Group of Merrill Advisers Leaves to Form Florida Firm Offering Specialized Services
thread.title_full: Group of Merrill Advisers Leaves to Form Florida Firm Offering Specialized Services - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Group of Merrill Advisers Leaves to Form Florida Firm Offering Specialized Services
text:
A team of Merrill Lynch financial advisers who manage more than $1 billion resigned on Tuesday to form an independent advisory firm to offer more specialized services to clients, such as paying bills and providing advice on custom-designed investments.
The move underscores how more advisers who focus on ultrawealthy clients are finding the traditional brokerage model too constricting, since a so-called family-office level of service... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
